description.displayText:
Our family was pursuing a nanny share when we found Nikia. We loved her personality right away - very communicative, responsive, and even-keeled. Her experience both at a professional daycare (Bright Horizons which is very rigorous in procedure) and as a nanny stood out; she was very knowledgeable about infant and child milestones.  She keenly observed the babies during the interview and would ask thoughtful questions about their development. 

While the nanny share did not work out because of logistical issues,  Nikia's references and her performance during the trial day were impeccable. Her references glowed about her motherly instincts and how babies love her. We found both to be very true. When my daughter started coughing in the middle of the day, Nikia ran a steam bath for her. She fixed our annoying blinds so that the baby could sleep. She was so proactive and so caring. I was heartened by how loving she was. Nikia is awesome!

description.displayText: Nikia has been our afternoon babysitter for several months now, and I can't sing her praises enough. The kids love her, and we do, too. She has a lot of early childhood experience and always goes above and beyond. She even drove my older son to Jersey for a play date on a day he had off from school- her idea! I know the kids are safe and happy with her, and I know she's also prepared to be on top of things if there is an emergency.
description.originalText: Nikia has been our afternoon babysitter for several months now, and I can't sing her praises enough. The kids love her, and we do, too. She has a lot of early childhood experience and always goes above and beyond. She even drove my older son to Jersey for a play date on a day he had off from school- her idea! I know the kids are safe and happy with her, and I know she's also prepared to be on top of things if there is an emergency.

description.displayText:
Nikia is an extremely warm, loving caretaker. 
She has looked after my daughter B. full time for the past year, staring when she was 3months old. Every time I come home, my daughter has a clean diaper, an adorable outfit on, and a big smile.
Nikia is very knowledgeable about childhood development, and caters activities to challenge B. and help her grow (she walked at 9 months, and is talking now at 15 months)  
Nikia is also really fun and creative - she organized and lead a weekly art class at our house with other kids in the neighborhood.
Being from New York, Nikia is great at navigating through the city w a stroller and was comfortable taking B. all over the city.  
She is a very kind and easy going person - a really great addition to any household!

description.displayText: Nikia is an exceptionally kind, warm, and intelligent caregiver who we have had the great fortune to have take care of our two young children.  Nikia is young, creative, and energetic. She has consistently shown herself to be reliable, patient, and thoughtful with our two boys who are themselves not always that. We are sad to have to lose her (we are moving) and wholeheartedly recommend her to any family.
description.originalText: Nikia is an exceptionally kind, warm, and intelligent caregiver who we have had the great fortune to have take care of our two young children.  Nikia is young, creative, and energetic. She has consistently shown herself to be reliable, patient, and thoughtful with our two boys who are themselves not always that. description.displayText: I trust Nikia implicitly and give her my highest recommendation.
description.originalText: I trust Nikia implicitly and give her my highest recommendation.

description.displayText:
I first met Nikia when she was the teacher at my infant son's daycare.  I was immediately impressed by her calm demeanor and her easy way with children.  I was so impressed, I asked if she would be willing to serve as a babysitter during the evenings.  Happily, she agreed.  

She's now our favorite and most frequent babysitter.  My son has moved to another daycare, and Nikia regularly picks him up there and brings him home on nights when I have to work.  The director and the assistant director of that center both made a special point to tell me how impressed they were by Nikia.  They also tried to hire her!  

I trust Nikia implicitly with my now 8 month old son.  She is responsible, trustworthy and great with babies.  She's been a lifesaver for me and my family, and I can't say enough good things about her.  I give her my highest recommendation.
